content: Identify a common phrase or idiom that describes the situation in which a team, consisting of 10 members, worked for 6 months on a project related to developing a new software application for a client in the finance industry. The team had to overcome several challenges, including a tight deadline, unforeseen technical issues, and communication barriers due to remote work. Despite these obstacles, the team managed to achieve success by delivering the project on time and exceeding the client's expectations. The success was measured by a 95% satisfaction rate from the client, a 20% increase in revenue for the client's business, and a 15% bonus for each team member.

A common phrase or idiom that captures this scenario is "against all odds." This phrase aptly describes how the team overcame numerous challenges and adversities to achieve successful results beyond expectations.
